lines: Passion is one great force that unleashes creativity, because if you're passionate about something, then you're more willing to take risks. #<Author:0x007f8831d35430>
Purpose is the reason you journey. Passion is the fire that lights the way. #<Author:0x007f8832b22c00>
Nothing is as important as passion. No matter what you want to do with your life, be passionate. #<Author:0x007f8832aa39f0>
Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember you have within you the strength, the patience and the passion to reach for the stars, to change the world. #<Author:0x007f8832b71378>
Passion is energy. Feel the power that comes from focusing on what excites you. #<Author:0x007f88327a9f10>
I think tolerance and acceptance and love is something that feeds every community. #<Author:0x007f88318f4880>

Our uniqueness, our individuality, and our life experience molds us into fascinating beings. I pray we may all challenge ourselves to delve into the deepest resources of our hearts to cultivate an atmosphere of understanding, acceptance, tolerance, and compassion. We are all in this life together. #<Author:0x007f8831d2af80>
True belonging doesnâ€™t require you to change who you are; it requires you to be who you are. #<Author:0x007f882cbd7048>

Our job on earth isn't to criticize, reject, or judge. Our purpose is to offer a helping hand, compassion, and mercy. We are to do unto others as we hope they would do unto us. #<Author:0x007f88312dcf10>
I believe that the greatest kindness is acceptance. #<Author:0x007f8832dfe5f0>
And the day came when the risk to remain tight in a bud was more painful than the risk it took to blossom. #<Author:0x007f8833780308>
A mind that is stretched by a new experience can never go back to its old dimensions. #<Author:0x007f883361c430>
It is important to remember that we cannot become what we need to be, by remaining what we are. #<Author:0x007f883229f038>
Live your life by a compass, not a clock. #<Author:0x007f8832099a18>
No one can really predict to what heights you might soar. Even you will not know until you spread your wings. #<Author:0x007f8839068e70>
Courtesies of a small and trivial character are the ones which strike deepest in the grateful and appreciating heart. #<Author:0x007f882c35eab0>
